page.title: 07RELIGION
page.content: In the village 3% are Roman Catholics,while the remainder 97% would claim to be Protestants.The population in the 1981 Census was 985 and only 45 people attend Church regularly which is less than 5%. The Church Hall is used weekly for Sunday School, Playgroup, Mothers and Toddlers, Women's Guild, Young Women's Group, Teen Club and Senior Circle.The Drama Group also uses the hall for re- hearsals. Sometimes the Church Hall is used for fundraising events such as: Coffee Mornings, Sales of Work, and Jumble Sales etc. The minister, the Reverand Brian Oxburgh BSc,BD came to Letham Church in 1980.Each Church Member contributes Â£20.30 on average each year, while the national average is Â£30.40.
